response.answer_text: Its amazing you are learning photography. This pic is Average. But its your first time, so don’t worry you will learn slowly. The key rule of photography is light. At the very first sight, I found problem with light in this pic. Second thing, as answered by someone that the object is deliberately placed to get a good background. But its okay to do experiment as you seem dedicated and excited. That’s interesting. It would have been more attractive with bright background. If the flower color would have been bright then this background would be good. If you want to use this background for clicking pictures, zoom in and click picture covering more part of the flower. Try to take pictures by focusing from different angles. That will help you a lot. Do more experiments, you will do better, I am sure. So keep experimenting. Good luck. :)

This is one question that you should ask yourself, daily. Check out the work of other famous photographers and see for yourself what’s the difference between their photos and yours. Few URL that you might want to check out. The Premier Photography Community ViewBug photography community with photo contests 1x - Curated photography Enjoy clicking. Ciao!!
